title: The most explored glaciers by the number of expeditions
summary: The most explored Glacier was Tasman with just 2 expeditions whilst 14 expeditions took place in Mefonna , the most explored Glacier in the cohort .
Most glaciers experienced 6 or fewer expeditions with only Mefonna and Akkem receiving more .
gold: This chart shows that Mefonna was the most explored glacier with 13 expeditions , followed by Akkem , Zvezda , Olav , Volta and last , Tasman with 2 expeditions .
